body: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas Edison

body: The only thing worse than being talked about is not being talked about.
author: Oscar Wilde

body: I can resist everything except temptation.
author: Oscar Wilde

body: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

body: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

body: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
author: Albert Einstein

body: The pen is mightier than the sword, but the keyboard is mightier than both.
author: Modern Wisdom

body: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
author: Unknown Philosopher
